mapper.insert: insert into `user`(user_status, user_registration_date, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_gender, user_email, user_registration_number) values (#{userStatus}, #{userRegistrationDate}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userEmail}, #{userRegistrationNumber});
mapper.select: select user_number from`user` where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
